alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 10:27PM CDT until August 03 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kit Carson County in east central Colorado... Northern Wallace County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Northwestern Logan County in west central Kansas... Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 1030 PM MDT/1130 PM CDT/. * At 927 PM MDT/1027 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Kanorado to 10 miles north of Sharon Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ruleton around 935 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Goodland and Winona. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 41. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 439 and 450. Highway 385 between mile markers 188 and 200. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
